name: Ancestral Dragon King of Zenith Colors, Founaherdio
effect: [CONT]: This card is regarded as "Spiritual King of Ignition, Valnout".Additional Effect - Choose one of your [Stand] rear-guards, and it gets "[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]: At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [Stand] this unit." until end of turn. If you did not choose a card, draw a card, choose up to one unit card from your hand, and call it to (RC).

effect: [CONT]: This card is regarded as "Spiritual King of Ignition, Valnout".Additional Effect - Choose one of your [Stand] rear-guards, and it gets "[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]: At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [Stand] this unit." until end of turn. If you did not choose a card, draw a card, choose up to one unit card from your hand, and call it to (RC).

name: Energy Generator
effect:
(You may only have one ride deck crest in a ride deck)
[AUTO]Ride Deck:When you ride, put this card into the crest zone, and if you went second, [Energy-Charge 3].
[CONT]:You may have up to ten energy.
[AUTO]:At the beginning of your ride phase, [Energy-Charge 3].
[ACT][1/turn]:[COST][Energy-Blast 7], and draw a card.
